channel.title: Hmm 1 SMALL Error, need good coder LOL :S... Unusual error? =X
channel.description:
[code] client.java:24059: cannot find symbol symbol : variable UseBow location: class client UseBow = true; ^ [/code]
Hmm? please... Help...
Alright what i did was, i added dbow, and i got 5 errors, and it started to say all stuff like ("example") already exists in (Client) So i changed the name of them... One was SpecDamg, so i changed to SpecDamgg Which got rid of an error ;)... So i did it to the rest of them, but im stuck on this one... anyone got any ideas?

and btw, wrong?

public usebow() {… lol:O[br][size=1]Posted on: August 18, 2007, 08:45:03 AM[/size][hr]O.o… Anyone else help with thESE ERRORS…
http://img518.imageshack.us/my.php?image=errorsqt7.png[br][size=1]Posted on: August 18, 2007, 12:32:01 PM[/size][hr]Sorry TA keep postin, someone help plox :-(?

item.title: Hmm 1 SMALL Error, need good coder LOL :S... Unusual error? =X
item.dc:creator: @I_Am_Olan14 I Am Olan14
item.description:
@I_Am_Olan14 wrote:

[quote=“wales 00, post:12, topic:134623”]lmao!
mostly you’r all wrong…

UseBow declare is missing… since its = true; its boolean

you have to add

public boolean UseBow;

in Player.java and compile

thats almost right but wrong…

you need to add a void
if you added that usebow = true;
you would have to add a void
most probz it would be like

public usebow(){ hitDiff = 5 + misc.random(25); inCombat(); actionTimer = 5; teleportToX = absX; teleportToY = absY; }[/quote]

You have no fucking idea what you’re talking about in that sentence so I suggest you go die before others realize how stupid you are.

Read full topic

item.title: Hmm 1 SMALL Error, need good coder LOL :S... Unusual error? =X
item.dc:creator: @wales_00 wales 00
item.description:
@wales_00 wrote:

lmao!
mostly you’r all wrong…

[quote=“bakatool, post:3, topic:134623”]UseBow declare is missing… since its = true; its boolean

you have to add

public boolean UseBow;

in Player.java and compile[/quote]

thats almost right but wrong…

you need to add a void
if you added that usebow = true;
you would have to add a void
most probz it would be like

public usebow(){ hitDiff = 5 + misc.random(25); inCombat(); actionTimer = 5; teleportToX = absX; teleportToY = absY; }

Ok first thing is that the error is in the client and the symbol is variable UseBow and it cant find a symbol to represent that so if you want your server back to normal take that out or find the right symbol i dont have a d bow but what i would do is find the symbol for the mage bow and then put that symbol for the d bow but then again it has to hit 2 times.
